info.description: IEDB epitopes.

info.displayName: T. cruzi NonEsmeraldo Like chromosomes sequence and annotation
info.description:
Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).
Sequencing of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute.

resource.pluginArgs: --extDbName %PARENT_RESOURCE_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %PARENT_RESOURCE_VERSION% --mapFile @@gusHome@@/lib/xml/isf/geneDBGFF2Gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @@dataDir@@/TcNonEsm_chromosomes_fixed/TcNonEsm.gff --inputFileExtension "gff" --fileFormat gff3 --soCvsVersion @@SO_VER@@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Non-Esmeraldo-like" --seqSoTerm "chromosome" --validationLog @@dataDir@@/validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @@dataDir@@/bioperlTree.out --seqIdColumn source_id --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence

info.description:
Sequence data for Trypanosoma cruzi contigs were downloaded from Genbank (sequence and annotated features).

info.displayName: T. cruzi Esmeraldo Like chromosomes sequence and annotation
info.description: Genome sequences and annotations for T.cruzi strain CL Brener were obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute Sequencing and annotation of T. cruzi was conducted by the Trypanosoma cruzi sequencing consortium (TIGR, Seattle Biomedical Research Institute and Karolinska Institute. Mapping of gene coordinates from contigs to chromosomes for T. cruzi was generated by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA. References: The genome sequence of Trypanosoma cruzi, etiologic agent of Chagas disease. Science 2005 Jul 15;309(5733):409-15 El-Sayed et al. Chromosome level assembly of the hybrid Trypanosoma cruzi genome.BMC Genomics. 2009 Jun 1;10:255.

resource.pluginArgs: --extDbName %PARENT_RESOURCE_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %PARENT_RESOURCE_VERSION% --mapFile @@gusHome@@/lib/xml/isf/geneDBGFF2Gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @@dataDir@@/TcEsm_chromosomes_fixed/TcEsm.gff --inputFileExtension "gff" --fileFormat gff3 --soCvsVersion @@SO_VER@@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Esmeraldo-like" --seqSoTerm "chromosome" --validationLog @@dataDir@@/validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @@dataDir@@/bioperlTree.out --seqIdColumn source_id --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence

Mapping of gene coordinates from contigs to chromosomes for T. cruzi was generated by Rick Tarleton's group at the University of Georgia, Atehns, Georgia. The Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases, University of Georgia, Athens, GA. References: The genome sequence of Trypanosoma cruzi, etiologic agent of Chagas disease. resource.pluginArgs: --ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/ec.txt --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

info.description: EC Number mapping.

resource.pluginArgs: --ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/ec.txt --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

info.description: EC Number mapping.

resource.pluginArgs: --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Tcruzi.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

info.displayName: External DbxRefs to TcSNP database for Tcruzi
info.description: TcSNP is an online resource/database with information on genetic variation(polymorphisms,mutations) for different stocks,strains and isolates of Trypanosoma cruzi, the causative agent of Chagas diseases.
